CLEWs-EU’s documentation!

This repository is the online documentation for the CLEWS-EU model developed for the Horizon DIAMOND project. The documentation gives a brief overview on the model structure, the individual modules and their design, the data and assumptions that go into the developmeent of each module.

Contents:

  • 1. Overview and model Structure
    • 1.1. Individual modules and their representation in CLEWS-EU
    • 1.2. Geographical resolution of the model
  • 2. Energy Module
    • 2.1. Electricity and heat generation
    • 2.2. Buildings
    • 2.3. Industry
    • 2.4. Transport
  • 3. Land and Water Module
    • 3.1. Agricultural land use
    • 3.2. Non agricultural land use
    • 3.3. Representation of the water system
    • 3.4. Livestock representation
  • 4. Model aggregations
  • 5. How to use CLEWS-EU
